Institution Name: KEBBI STATE UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY, ALIERO, KEBBI STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: [Not Available]
UTME Requirements:
SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
Subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.
